Deal with the Gnomes Objectives

Find the gnomes' hideout.

We agreed to help Manip Falcäo track down and kill the gnomes attacking their checkpoint. He promised to reward us if we bring him the head of their leader. We should find the gnomes' hideout.

Deal with the Gnomes Walkthrough

After the incident at the South Span Checkpoint. Flaming Fist Manip asks you to kill the Ironhand gnomes. The entrance to Angleiron's Cellar is on the Lower floor of th
